---
title: "Course Datasets"
---

There are three main **case studies** that we use:

## 1. Simulated Austrian Hotels

A simulated set of data tables on hotels in Austria for practicing data wrangling and joining tables.

Used in: Week 4

Location: [data/austria-hotels](austria-hotels/)

## 2. World Values Survey (WVS)

The 7th Wave of the World Values Survey dataset merged with GDP data from World Bank.

Used in: Week 2, Week 3

Location: [data/VWS](VWS/)

## 3. Football Manager Interviews

A series of post-game interview texts for text analysis and sentiment analysis practice.

Used in: Week 5, Week 6

Location: [data/interviews](interviews/)
